dsOverview.title: U.S.S.R. Northern Hemisphere Daily Sea-Level Pressure Grids for 1880 to 1979

summary.p: This dataset contains once-daily Northern Hemisphere sea-level pressure data on a 10-degree by 5-degree (36x16) latitude/longitude grid for the period 1880 to 1979.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: RU/SRIHI/WDC > World Data Center, All-Union Scientific Research Institute for Hydrometeorological Information, Russia

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Pressure > Sea Level Pressure
